summary: The document is a rent reminder letter from Summit Hill Properties, Inc. to Roger Shea, dated August 17, 1964, regarding an unpaid rent of $219.00 due on August 1, 1964. The letter politely requests the payment by return mail and emphasizes the importance of timely rent payments.
key_findings: The document is a formal rent reminder.
It highlights the due date of the rent and the amount unpaid.
The tone is polite, suggesting the non-payment might be an oversight.
It underscores the expectation of cooperation in timely rent payments.
